doc:
Steve Levitt (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Levitt_(actor) 0 Steve Levitt (born February 29, 1960) is an American actor who has appeared in films and on television. He is best known for his role in the 1987 movie Hunk as Bradley Brinkman and a recurring role in the Showtime TV series The Paper Chase. Levitt's first feature film was in the 1980 movie Those Lips, Those Eyes, he also appeared in the 1983 comedy movie Private School as a bellboy. He appeared in the 1986 film Last Resort and The Experts in 1989. Levitt has starred in TV movies such as Bill (1981), Malibu (1983), The Incredible Hulk Returns (1988) as Donald Blake, and Get Smart, Again! (1989). He starred in the short lived TV series The Boys as Gil. Steve_Levitt ( born February_29_,_1960 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in films and on television . He is_best_known for his_role in the_1987_movie_Hunk as Bradley_Brinkman and a_recurring_role in the_Showtime_TV_series_The_Paper_Chase . Levitt 's_first_feature_film was in the_1980_movie Those_Lips , Those_Eyes , he also appeared in the_1983_comedy_movie_Private_School as a_bellboy . He appeared in the_1986_film Last_Resort and The_Experts in 1989 . Levitt has_starred in TV_movies such_as Bill ( 1981_) , Malibu_(_1983 ) , The_Incredible_Hulk_Returns ( 1988_) as Donald_Blake , and Get Smart , Again ! (_1989_) . He starred in the_short_lived_TV_series The_Boys as Gil .
